description: Discord bot called WALL-E, who is ran by OpenAI gpt-3.5-turbo. It can be tought information by giving it these types of files - .csv, .docx, .html, .htm, .json, .md, .pdf, .txt, .xlsx, .yaml, .yml - which must be placed in the folder data/
